question: A Piece of equipment you use at home for your work is causing problems , write a letter to company/shop. Describe the problem, explain how it’s affecting your work and what would you like the company to do. write 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter to express my dissatisfaction towards the technical glitch I am experiencing in the working of the Bajaj mixer grinder I purchased from your shop last Monday.

Being a chef by profession, I make a large quantity of food every day, as I run a tiffin service from my home. Yesterday when I was grinding the gravy in grinder, there was a sudden loud noise from it, after which it completely stopped working. I tried removing and reinstalling the plug but it does not work at all.

As I already mentioned, I run a tiffin service, I have to make large quantities of food every day. With the mixer not working the preparation time for food increases, causing delay in delivery of the tiffins. As a result, all my customers are complaining about the same.

Therefore, I would request you to send somebody to repair the mixer on priority, as it is hampering my work. I would also request if you can send a spare mixer along with your engineer in case my equipment is  going to take time for the repair work.
I look back to hearing back from you immediately
